Maven SVN Revision Number Plugin
Last Published: 2010-04-02  | Version: 1.3
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Usage
Examples
  • Storing output properties in a file
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

svn-revision-number:revision

Full name:

com.google.code.maven-svn-revision-number-plugin:maven-svn-revision-number-plugin:1.3:revision

Description:

Retrieves retrieves the revision number and the status of a file or a directory under Subversion version control.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: initialize.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
entries Entry[] - Specifies the list of entries to inspect. Each entry has a separate configuration consisting of the local path, report options and the prefix for the output properties.

Example: 
<entries>
  <entry>
    <path>path<path>
    <prefix>prefix<prefix>
    <recursive>true<recursive>
    <reportUnversioned>false<reportUnversioned>
    <reportIgnored>false<reportIgnored>
    <reportOutOfDate>false<reportOutOfDate>
  <entry>
<entries>

If entries configuration is not specified then the goal will operate on the default entry with entry path equal to the project basedir and properties prefix equal to the project artifactId.
verbose boolean - Specifies whether the goal runs in verbose mode.

Parameter Details

entries:

Specifies the list of entries to inspect. Each entry has a separate configuration consisting of the local path, report options and the prefix for the output properties.

Example: 
<entries>
  <entry>
    <path>path<path>
    <prefix>prefix<prefix>
    <recursive>true<recursive>
    <reportUnversioned>false<reportUnversioned>
    <reportIgnored>false<reportIgnored>
    <reportOutOfDate>false<reportOutOfDate>
  <entry>
<entries>

If entries configuration is not specified then the goal will operate on the default entry with entry path equal to the project basedir and properties prefix equal to the project artifactId.
  • Type: oe.maven.plugins.revision.Entry[]
  • Required: No

verbose:

Specifies whether the goal runs in verbose mode.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
